description: Miscellany (David ben Joshua ben Abraham Maimonides's commentary on Maimonides's Mishneh Torah (Sefer ha-zemanim: Hilkhot ḳidush ha-ḥodesh); commentary on the Sefer yetsirah, attributed to Abraham ben David of Posquières)
title: Miscellany (David ben Joshua ben Abraham Maimonides's commentary on Maimonides's Mishneh Torah (Sefer ha-zemanim: Hilkhot ḳidush ha-ḥodesh); commentary on the Sefer yetsirah, attributed to Abraham ben David of Posquières)
